title: i cant login riot help
body: i can login and its saying i cant connect to pvp.net sever i tried repatching and all i could do my internet is working just fine i hvae no idea what to do some one help

replies.body: im in california and still wont work

Are you still have any issues logging in?  If so, go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to rule out anything with your network that might be failing to establish a connection to the server.  Let me now!
seems like its Comcast, everyone having issues has Comcast as I can tell
I've seen others having issues with other ISPS too. I'm using comcast right now too though. ;-;
In Washington using Charter. Haven't been able to log in for the past 3 hours. Says the same thing, "Connection Error"
Yeah I got same thing going on for the last 1.5 hours...... West Coast Canada here.
Hmm I am also in Washington... Tacoma and I am also using comcast..
quite a few of us are having the same problem. are you in western WA? are you using comcast?
